tileData.text: What would you like to do?

There should be an '@', followed by a domain (name@email.com).
Was the email address you used to place the order?
Sure! I can set you up to talk to a customer service agent as soon as they're back online
Hi! I'm your virtual assistant, here to guide you along your jewelry shopping experience.
What would you like to do?

Hmm, that doesn't look quite right. I'm looking for just your first name.
Let's try that again. Can I get your name?

Hi! I'm your virtual assistant.

Our business hours are Monday-Friday 9am-10pm Eastern, and Saturday-Sunday
12pm-9pm Eastern.

In the meantime, I can grab a bit of info from you to pass along as soon as our team members are back online.

conversationMessage.name: multiple_choice_question_3

tileData.text: Hi there! Before we get started, what's your preferred language?

conversationMessage.name: dialog_starter

tileData.text: Alright, I'll just grab a bit of info from you to speed things along, and then I'll get you to the right person.

Hmm, that doesn't look quite right. I'm looking for just your first name.
Let's try that again. Can I get your name?
Sorry, I am not able to understand.
Got it. In a few words, can you summarize what you're reaching out about?

tileData.text:

Someone will reach out as soon as they're available.
To start, can I get your first name?
